long_description: Built for chasing tadpoles at the local lake or exploring the deep end of the pool for sunken treasure, the Teva Toachi 2 sandals are packed full of performance features for young adventurers. Synthetic leather uppers let water flow freely from sandals and dry quickly for comfort in varied elements. Universal strapping system offers a secure and easy fit for growing feet; padded heel straps add comfort. Neoprene linings and unique toe bumpers protect bare feet from pressure and abrasion while helping to keep debris out. Soft EVA topsoles and midsoles absorb shock and transfer it for enhanced push-off energy. Nonmarking Spider Rubber(R) outsoles with aggressive lug design bite into mixed terrain and shed debris. Teva Toachi sandals feature a Microban(R) zinc-based antimicrobial treatment to deter odors.
short_description: Built for chasing tadpoles at the local lake or exploring the deep end of the pool for sunken treasure, the Teva Toachi 2 sandals are packed full of performance features for young adventurers.
